page.title: 04MY HOUSE IN CHELTENHAM
page.content: MY HOUSE IS CALLED NETHERMUIR.IT IS A LARGE HOUSE WITH A DRIVE.IT HAS SIX FLOORS,INCLUDING THE CELLAR,BUT WE REALLY ONLY USE THREE OF THEM.THE FLOOR ABOVE THE CELLAR HAS EIGHT ROOMS,FOUR OF WHICH ARE BEDROOMS,ONE IS A LOUNGE,ONE IS A BATHROOM AND ONE IS A TOILET.THE OTHER ROOM IS A KITCHEN.THE REST OF THE ROOMS ARE RENTED TO PEOPLE SO WE DONT USE THEM AT ALL.MOST OF OUR FURNITURE IS EITHER OLD FASHIONED OR ANTIQUE.THE MOST MODERN FACILITY IS THE VIDEO RECORDER.MY FAVOURITE ROOM IS THE LOUNGE BECAUSE I CAN GO THERE TO RELAX OR PLAY.
